name: test_e2e_with_logs[551_HHI_FWD_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_FWD_001` |
| **Name** | Forwarded header host |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | forwarded_header |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `Forwarded: host=evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `Forwarded%3A%20host%3Devil.com`

## Test Execution Results

- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~6000ms
